tool_description: Analyzes historical price trends and market velocity to determine time-based adjustments for comparable sales that occurred at different time periods.

market_zip_code.description: ZIP code for market trend analysis

trend_period_months.description: Number of months to analyze for trend calculation (3-36)

error_messages: Invalid date format: All dates must be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Future valuation date: valuation_date cannot be in the future relative to current date.
Invalid trend period: trend_period_months must be between 3 and 36 months.
Insufficient trend data: Not enough historical sales data available for reliable trend analysis in the specified ZIP code.
Invalid ZIP code: ZIP code format is incorrect or area not found.
usage: Provide comparable sale dates, target valuation date, and market ZIP code. Optionally specify trend analysis period. Returns time-based adjustment factors for each comparable sale.

time_adjustments.description: Time-based adjustment factors for each comparable (1.0 = no adjustment)

monthly_appreciation_rate.description: Average monthly price appreciation rate for the market

trend_direction.description: Market trend direction: appreciating, stable, or depreciating

trend_strength.description: Trend strength: strong, moderate, or weak
